items.content_html: utcToLocalTimezone is a lightweight, zero-dependency JavaScript utility that converts UTC date/time strings to local time for any IANA timezone. It uses native Date and Intl.DateTimeFormat APIs for customizable, efficient time formatting without external libraries.
items.title: shubhampatel9977/utcToLocalTimezone: utcToLocalTimezone is a lightweight, zero-dependency JavaScript utility that converts UTC date/time strings to local time for any IANA timezone. It uses native Date and Intl.DateTimeFormat APIs for customizable, efficient time formatting without external libraries.
